jobDescription: The Concierge is responsible for courteous, prompt and efficient service. The concierge will recognize all residents and guests with verbal recognition and eye contact. The position is often referred to as the face of the community. In accordance, actions and appearances must reflect the brand. The position is responsible for creating the first impression of the community. surrounding area.Answers all incoming calls by the second ring.Directs incoming calls to the appropriate department or person.Processing mail for the community as well as residents when needed.Assists with coordinating resident transportation.Handles complaints with tact and solves resident concerns to the degree possible.Communicates with Executive Director and/or Assistant Executive Director all
